title: Radiant Wukong Summoner Icon

embed.description: The Radiant Wukong Figure comes with a special digital unlock of an exclusive Worlds Radiant Wukong icon. Follow the instructions post checkout to unlock. Digital unlocks are only eligible within the region you made the purchase in. If you're

body: I was wondering if the icon also included an emote?

replies.body: I purchased yesterday....and I thought it is emote icon....but I tested...no:(
Hi, if you know anyone who's gonna buy the figure and won't need the icon please contact me, I'll buy the icon from them :)
where can i unlock this icon, on my acc page? i just purchased it with Radiant Wukong Figure.

why i cant unlock Radiant Wukong Summoner Icon
 UNLOCK ERROR An unknown problem has occurred. Please try again in a few minutes. 2 days just like this

What did they say?

Kind regards
same issue, im waiting for the answer too :(
Hey man. What did they say?
Hey there, I was able to reach out to our merch team and it looks like the icon will not be an emote.  Still a pretty radiant figure.  :D
How do I unlock the icon for my NA account if I buy it on EUW.

They're specific to each region, so it wouldn't work on NA if you bought it on EUW.  You'll want to hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if our merch team can swap the region for you.
Did they allow the transfer of the code?
Haven't bought it yet but merch team said they could.
Does it not count as a Worlds Icon? It has the little worlds symbol on it but it doesn't seem to work with the missions. :<{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

why i cant unlock Radiant Wukong Summoner Icon
UNLOCK ERROR An unknown problem has occurred. Please try again in a few minutes. 2 days just like this

where can i unlock the icon?
 i just purchased it with the Radiant Wukong Figure

where can i unlock the icon?
 i just purchased it with the Radiant Wukong Figure
